recipes.title: Beef Stir Fry
recipes.description: A quick stir fry with tender beef strips, vegetables, and a savory sauce.
instructions: In a bowl, combine soy sauce, oyster sauce, hoisin sauce, sesame oil, ginger, and garlic.
Toss the beef strips in the sauce and let marinate for 10 minutes.
Heat a wok or skillet over high heat and add a little oil.
Stir fry the beef for 2-3 minutes until browned and cooked through. Remove from the pan.
In the same pan, stir fry the broccoli, bell pepper, and onion for 3-4 minutes.
Return the beef to the pan and add the cornstarch and water mixture. Stir until the sauce thickens and the beef is coated.

recipes.title: Chocolate Lava Cake
recipes.description: A rich, decadent dessert with a molten chocolate center.
instructions: Preheat the oven to 425°F (220°C). Grease four ramekins with butter and lightly dust with flour.
Melt chocolate and butter together in a heatproof bowl over simmering water.
Whisk together powdered sugar, eggs, egg yolks, and vanilla extract until smooth.
Stir in the melted chocolate mixture and flour. Divide the batter evenly between the ramekins.
Bake for 12-14 minutes until the edges are set but the center is soft.
Let cool for 1 minute before inverting onto plates and serving.

recipes.title: Shrimp Scampi Pasta
recipes.description: Garlicky shrimp tossed with spaghetti in a buttery lemon sauce.
instructions: Cook spaghetti according to package instructions.
Heat butter and olive oil in a pan. Add garlic and red pepper flakes, cook 1 minute.
Add shrimp and cook until pink, about 2 minutes per side.
Stir in lemon juice and cooked pasta. Toss to combine.
Garnish with parsley and serve immediately.

recipes.title: Margarita Pizza
recipes.description: A classic Italian pizza with fresh tomatoes, mozzarella, and basil
instructions: Preheat oven to 475°F (245°C).
Roll out dough on a floured surface.
Spread tomato sauce over the dough, then top with cheese and tomato slices.
Bake for 12-15 minutes until crust is golden.
Top with fresh basil, drizzle with olive oil, and serve.

recipes.title: Spiced Lentil Curry
recipes.description: A comforting Sri Lankan–South Indian style lentil curry made with red lentils, coconut milk, and fragrant spices. Perfect with rice or roti.
instructions: Wash lentils thoroughly and add to a pot with water, turmeric, and a pinch of salt. Boil until soft (about 15–20 minutes).
In a separate pan, heat coconut oil and add mustard seeds. Once they start to pop, add cumin seeds, curry leaves, and green chili.
Add chopped onions, garlic, and ginger. Sauté until golden brown.
Stir in red chili powder, then pour in the cooked lentils. Mix well.
Add coconut milk and simmer for 5 minutes. Adjust salt to taste.
Garnish with fresh coriander and serve hot with rice, string hoppers, or roti.
